title: Penetration Tester

company.name: Orange Digital Center
company.description: Orange's digital innovation center for Africa and Middle East

description: We need a Penetration Tester to protect our systems and data. You will be responsible for security assessments, incident response, and implementing security best practices across our infrastructure.
responsibilities: Stay updated on latest security threats and trends
Review code and architecture for security issues
Respond to security incidents and threats
Conduct security assessments and penetration testing
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Passion for technology and continuous learning
